title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil pasta, fry guanciale, mix with egg and cheese, combine.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook onion and garlic, add chicken, spices, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Simmer until cooked.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Sauté beef and onions, add mushrooms and spices, finish with sour cream.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry all vegetables with garlic and ginger, add soy sauce, and serve hot.

title: Chocolate Soufflé
instructions: Melt chocolate, fold in egg whites and other ingredients, bake until risen.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour batter on hot pan, cook both sides until golden.

title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with oil, lemon, and spices, grill until cooked.

title: Lasagna
instructions: Layer pasta, meat, sauce, and cheese; bake until golden and bubbling.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons, cheese, and grilled chicken on top.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Cook onion and mushrooms, add rice, gradually add broth while stirring, finish with parmesan.

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Layer coffee-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone mixture, dust with cocoa, chill before serving.

title: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocado, mix with chopped onion, tomato, lime juice, cilantro, and salt.
